name: Downgrade (Puff)
description:
[INFO]

This game was made for the first ever puff jam on itch.io, with the theme "Sacrifice"

The game was made in unreal engine.

https://itch.io/jam/puff-jam

[HOW TO PLAY]

Fight off robot enemies endlessly, but every 30 seconds a menu pops up.

The menu asks you to choose something to sacrifice.

You can choose between: 

your legs (which will make you slower),

your arms (which will make you do less damage),

your eyes (which will make you have less range),

your heart (which will make you have less health).

[CONTROLS]

WASD to move

Left click to attack

1 to set graphics to low

2 to set graphics to medium

3 to set graphics to high
